message: OK, done that, all working now, thanks.
I'm sure you're up to your eyeballs with the move to the new backend... but, when you get a chance:
http://www.andyinamerica.com/ is down, with the above error message. Nothing in the console output.
we're doing them manually as we find them, but it's quicker if you can do it, as we don't need to extract the code then
@j4mie Can you re-upload your app? A few percent of our apps didn't enjoy the migration from 2.6 to 2.7 and need re-bundling
FYI it was an entirely static site:
might be another error as well
So not sure why the 2.6 -> 2.7 migration should have affected anything..
